column5: Sihanoukville International Airport Police Force cooperated with the Preah Sihanouk Department of Investigation and Immigration Department deport 7 Chinese nationals.------The Chinese nationals were arrested by the Preah Sihanouk Provincial Police in July in connection with the illegal use of drugs (*probably the ------Obama raid------).------They were put on Flights DR5036 and 8L886 (KOS-CHN) and barred from returning  for 3 years.------Source: General Department of Immigration
